Class UseMiddlewareFramingConnectionHandshakeExtensions

Extension methods for adding typed middleware to a IFramingConnectionHandshakeBuilder.

UseMiddleware(IFramingConnectionHandshakeBuilder, Type, Object[])

Adds a middleware type to the connection handshake pipeline.
